com.vedantatree.redmineconnector
Class RestletClient

java.lang.Object
  com.vedantatree.redmineconnector.RestletClient

public class RestletClient
extends java.lang.Object

This object works as client for Rest API. It is specifically designed for consuming the Redmine Rest API. For implementation, it is using Restlet API.

Author:
Mohit Gupta [mohit.gupta@vedantatree.com]

Method Detail

executeGetRequest

public java.lang.String executeGetRequest(java.lang.String URL)
                                   throws RCException
This method executes the get request for Rest API with given URL. It is generally used to retrieve any existing information

Parameters:
URL - The URL for getting an information from server. It will be invoked with HTTP GET operation
Returns:
Information returned from Server
Throws:
RCException - Throws Exception if there is any problem

executePutRequest

public java.lang.String executePutRequest(java.lang.String URL,
                                          java.lang.String contents)
                                   throws RCException
This method executes the put request for Rest API with given URL. It is generally used to updated any existing information on server

Parameters:
URL - The URL for putting an information to server. It will be invoked with HTTP PUT operation
contents - to send to server
Returns:
Information returned from Server
Throws:
RCException - Throws Exception if there is any problem

executePostRequest

public java.lang.String executePostRequest(java.lang.String URL,
                                           java.lang.String contents)
                                    throws RCException
This method executes the post request for Rest API with given URL. It is generally used to create a new information at server.

Parameters:
URL - The URL for posting an information to server. It will be invoked with HTTP POST operation
contents - to send to server
Returns:
Information returned from Server
Throws:
RCException - Throws Exception if there is any problem

executeDeleteRequest

public java.lang.String executeDeleteRequest(java.lang.String URL)
                                      throws RCException
This method executes the delete request for Rest API with given URL. It is generally used to delete any existing information from server.

Parameters:
URL - The URL for deleting any information from server. It will be invoked with HTTP DELETE operation
Returns:
Information returned from Server
Throws:
RCException - Throws Exception if there is any problem
